title: 5/4/17 - Glenn shares lessons learned with Stephen Colbert (Aaron Watson Stops By)
description:
GOP getting a new health care bill passed today? ...The biggest transfer of wealth in history?... Joe Scarborough & Mika Brzezinski tying the knot ...Alex Jones is actually deceased comedian Bill Hicks??? ...What motivates Stephen Colbert?... .Country music super star Aaron Watson stops by in the wake of his Number 1 album 'Vaquero' ...Aaron Watson is working out with pregnant moms and they're kicking his butt ...Happy May The Fourth Be With You Day and the incredible history behind the Star Wars movies.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
